title: 7th May 1794: Cult of the Supreme Being formally announced by Robespierre in a meeting of the National Convention
itunes:summary: The Cult of the Supreme Being recognised that God had created the universe, but that He did not interfere or intervene in its operation. Therefore it taught that humans were responsible for their own actions and ...
